meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sandy Carroll Andrew Harris Jen Fiero Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6880.

td.p: Sandy Carroll, a retired teacher from Avoca, Iowa
Andrew Harris, a corporate intelligence analyst from New York, New York
Jen Fiero, a librarian from Jackson, Michigan (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,600)

tr.td: LETTER AFTER P
ON THE BALL
A BOOKISH CATEGORY
BEAUTY & SKIN CARE PRODUCTS
PLANES OF YESTERYEAR

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
